description: The commandos raid the Legion headquarters, easily overpowering the guards to get to the secret box that contains all the incriminating photos of the Legion's operations. Blond Jesse Tyler struggles with Zak over the box, and Zak spanks his smooth and creamy buns before invading his enemy's territory. Underdog Jesse never quits, and soon turns the tables on Zak, gets the box and triumphs for good.
title: The Abduction Series, Part III - Redemption, Scene #06
